section.p: An event in which a health factor is recorded.

ol.li: Contains exactly one [1..1] comments with data type String
Contains exactly one [1..1] dataSource with data type Code

Contains exactly one [1..1] healthFactor with data type Code
An event in which a health factor is recorded.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
A unique identifier for the Act [HL7].
Contains exactly one [1..1] severity with data type Code
Contains exactly one [1..1] softwarePackage with data type Code
Contains exactly one [1..1] encompassingVisit, where its type is Outpatient Visit
Contains exactly one [1..1] patient, where its type is Patient
